SIM: Nano-SIM and eSIM - International | Dual eSIM with multiple numbers - USA | Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by) - China
Display_Type: LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz, HDR10, Dolby Vision, 1000 nits (typ), 2000 nits (HBM)
Main_Camera: 48 MP (wide) | 12 MP (periscope telephoto) | 48 MP (ultrawide) | TOF 3D LiDAR scanner
Battery_Info: Li-Ion, non-removable | USB Type-C 3.2 Gen 2, DisplayPort | 25W wireless (MagSafe)
Sensors: Face ID, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer
Other_Features: Glass front (Corning-made), glass back (Corning-made), titanium frame | IP68 dust/water resistant | Always on Display

Description.Description_Title_One: Experience Innovation with the iPhone 16 Pro Max
Description.Description_Title_Two: A18 Pro Chip - Power Like Never Before
Description.Description_Title_Three: Enjoy a seamless 120Hz refresh rate on the 6.9-inch OLED screen, providing ultra-smooth scrolling and breathtaking visuals.
Description.Description_Text_One: The iPhone 16 Pro Max redefines smartphone technology with its powerful A18 Pro chip, stunning 6.9-inch Super Retina XDR display, and advanced camera system. Built with a titanium frame, it offers unparalleled durability while maintaining a sleek design. The upgraded battery life ensures you stay connected all day. With 5G connectivity and iOS 18, enjoy the smoothest and fastest user experience yet.
